org.janusproject.acl.ACLMessage

    Package Description
    org.janusproject.acl

    • Uses of ACLMessage in org.janusproject.acl

      Methods in org.janusproject.acl that return ACLMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ACLMessage ACLAgent.getACLMessage(EnumFipaProtocol protocolType, Performative performative)
      Replies the first available ACL Message in the agent mail box with the given performative and the given protocol type and, then, removes it from the mailbox.
      ACLMessage ACLAgent.getACLMessageForConversationId(java.util.UUID conversationId)
      Replies the first available ACL Message for a specific conversation and, then, removes it from the mailbox.
      ACLMessage ACLMessageHandler.prepareIncomingMessage(ACLTransportMessage tMsg, java.lang.Object... parameters)
      This method calls the method decode() of the ACLMessageHandler.getEncodingService() to decode the ACLMessage encoded inside the ACLTransportMessage and then returns it.
      Methods in org.janusproject.acl with parameters of type ACLMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ACLTransportMessage ACLMessageHandler.prepareOutgoingACLMessage(ACLMessage aMsg, org.janusproject.kernel.address.AgentAddress... agents)
      This method sets the receivers of the ACLMessage and calls the method encode() of the ACLMessageHandler.getEncodingService() to encode the ACLMessage in an array of bytes and return it.
      org.janusproject.kernel.address.AgentAddress ACLAgent.sendACLMessage(ACLMessage message, org.janusproject.kernel.address.AgentAddress... agents)
      Sends the specified ACL Message to one randomly selected agent.
